modName: Ice Wraith Ice Spike Spell Remover
summary: Although it is debatable how immersive the casting of frost wall by an ice wraith is. To me personally it is not immersive at all. This mod removes the ability for ice wraiths to cast an ice wall.
descriptionHtml:
PRESENTING: THE MOST INEXPLICABLE AND MINISCULE MOD ON THE NEXUS! TADA!

Although it is debatable how immersive the casting of frost wall by an ice wraith is. To me personally it is not immersive at all. This mod removes the ability for ice wraiths to cast ice wall. It's a quick 5 minute piece of work in any case.

To uninstall simply remove the esp NoIceWraithSpikes.esp

Funnily enough, my only other mod is also related to frost. Rather, the climate. If you want to see a mod that actually changes something significant,
take a look:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28897/?
author: Akratus
